info.name: UDS RFQ Management System
info.description: API collection for the UDS RFQ Management System

request.description: Authenticate a user and return a JWT token
Invalidate the current user's authentication token
Get the current authenticated user's information
Get all RFQs with filtering and pagination
Get a specific RFQ by ID
Update the status of an RFQ
Generate a quote from an RFQ
Get a specific RFQ template by ID
Export an RFQ to PDF or Excel
Get all customers with filtering and pagination

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Acme Corporation",
    "email": "contact@acme.com",
    "phone": "123-456-7890",
    "address": "123 Main St, Anytown, USA",
    "contactPerson": "John Doe",
    "category": "Corporate",
    "quickbooksId": "QB12345"
}

request.description: Get a specific customer by ID

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Updated Acme Corporation",
    "email": "updated@acme.com",
    "phone": "987-654-3210",
    "address": "456 Main St, Anytown, USA",
    "contactPerson": "Jane Doe"
}

query.description: The search term for customer name, email, etc.

request.description: Search through customers based on a query string.

item.name: Inventory/SKU Management

request.description: Get all inventory items with filtering and pagination

body.raw:
{
    "sku": "CHAIR-001",
    "name": "Ergonomic Office Chair",
    "description": "High-quality ergonomic office chair",
    "category": "Office Furniture",
    "price": 199.99,
    "costPrice": 120,
    "stockQuantity": 50,
    "minStockLevel": 10,
    "unitOfMeasure": "each",
    "attributes": {
        "color": "Black",
        "material": "Mesh",
        "adjustable": true
    }
}

request.description: Get a specific inventory item by ID
Get sales history for an item

query.description: The search term for SKU or description.

request.description: Search through inventory items based on SKU or description.
Get sales history for a specific inventory item (replace '1' with actual item ID).

item.description: Endpoints for inventory and SKU management

request.description: OAuth callback URL for QuickBooks integration
Check the status of the QuickBooks connection

item.name: Push RFQ as Estimate to QuickBooks

request.description: Push an RFQ as an estimate to QuickBooks
Parse email content to extract RFQ data

item.name: SKU Mappings

query.description: Optional search term for standard SKU, description, or variation

request.description: Get all SKU mappings with optional search and pagination
Get a specific SKU mapping by ID (replace '1' with actual mapping ID).
Update a specific SKU mapping (replace '1' with actual mapping ID). Include variation IDs for existing variations to update, omit ID for new variations.
Delete a specific SKU mapping (replace '1' with actual mapping ID).
Detect and suggest standard SKUs for a list of potentially non-standard SKUs.

formdata.description: Select the CSV or Excel file containing SKU mappings.

request.description: Import SKU mappings from a CSV or Excel file. Ensure you select a file in the 'Body' tab.

query.description: Export format (csv or json). Defaults to csv.

request.description: Export all SKU mappings in the specified format (CSV or JSON).

item.description: Endpoints for managing SKU variations and standard mappings
